channel.title: Dumb question
channel.description:
ok here it goes..
well i can admit when i need help.. im know im dont know anything about programming or "codeing" but i have a serious question, and im aware that people are going to flame me for asking this and maby even ridicule me.. but here it goes:
i have been out of the game for a while and decieded to host a server again.. i dont know were to put my ip in my source to make it online.. so i have no idea where to put my enjoyzscape.no-ip.biz at?

item.title: Dumb question
item.dc:creator: @craigdamaster craigdamaster
item.description:
@craigdamaster wrote:

ooo0ooo:

ehh i dont really have a client just a source… thanks for trying to help though… i just need to know how to get my source online and for others to access it… ive got a no-ip ive port foworaded i just need to figure out hop to have the source go online useing my ip… if that makes sence?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 20, 2009, 09:32:46 pm[/size][hr]i need to put my server in the source somewhere i just dont know where… tello me were to put my enjoyzscape.no-ip.biz at

Well, as a 2 Year Coder, thats easy
grab an open client, edit it and stuff or leave it but give the Credits, be aware of missing models!
GO TO
FRAME_SUB_1 AND LOOK FOR 127.0.0 and if its not there it must be in
EGUI.JAVA
OR
GUI.JAVA IN THE BEGINNING, THX!

Craig.

Read full topic

item.title: Dumb question
item.dc:creator: @samskswanch samskswanch
item.description:
@samskswanch wrote:

ooo0ooo:

god im stupid haha ok im good now… now i need to make myself the owner some how… haha thanks though id rep if i could haha

go into your characters files in your source and find your name. go into it and change “player rights” from 0 to 3 then save. ( you have to stay signed out while doing this)

Read full topic

item.title: Dumb question
item.dc:creator: @LKCTheReturn LKCTheReturn
item.description:
@LKCTheReturn wrote:

    if(s.endsWith("127.0.0.1"))

Search for that in the client.java for your client… Change the 127.0.0.1 to your ip address
